name: AccuWeather
description: Weather and forecast data for locations worldwide with detailed current conditions and forecasts

name: Aemet
description: Weather and forecast data from Spain's national meteorological agency

name: AviationWeather
description: NOAA aviation weather forecasts, METARs, TAFs and pilot weather observations

name: ColorfulClouds (Caiyun)
description: Minute-level precipitation forecast and weather data, strong in Asia-Pacific region

name: Euskalmet
description: Meteorological data of the Basque Country from the regional weather service

name: HG Weather
description: Weather forecast data for cities in Brazil with current conditions

name: Hong Kong Observatory
description: Weather information, earthquake data and climate statistics for Hong Kong

name: MET Norway (Yr)
description: Free weather data from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute, powers Yr.no

name: ODWeather
description: Weather data and weather webcam feeds from ocean-related stations

name: Oikolab
description: 70+ years of global hourly historical and forecast weather data from NOAA and ECMWF

name: openSenseMap
description: Crowdsourced environmental data from personal weather stations (senseBoxes)

name: QWeather
description: Location-based weather data including forecasts, air quality and weather warnings

name: RainViewer
description: Global radar and satellite weather maps with rain and cloud data

name: Yandex Weather
description: Detailed weather conditions and forecasts for locations worldwide

name: weather-api (Duessmann)
description: Simple RESTful API to check current weather for any city worldwide

name: Pirate Weather
description: Dark Sky API compatible weather forecast using open government data sources

name: Bright Sky
description: Open weather data from the German Meteorological Service (DWD) as a JSON API

name: Meteostat
description: Access to historical weather and climate data from stations worldwide

name: World Weather Online
description: Global weather data, forecasts, historical weather and marine weather API

name: AerisWeather
description: Comprehensive weather data platform with mapping, alerts and severe weather data

name: NOAA Climate Data Online
description: Historical climate data from NOAA's National Centers for Environmental Information

name: NASA POWER
description: NASA's solar and meteorological data for renewable energy, agriculture and climatology

name: Copernicus Climate Data Store
description: ECMWF's climate data including ERA5 reanalysis and seasonal forecasts

name: EPA AirNow
description: Real-time air quality data and forecasts for locations across the United States

name: PurpleAir
description: Real-time air quality sensor data from a global network of low-cost sensors

name: IQAir
description: Real-time air quality data and forecasts for cities worldwide

name: BreezoMeter
description: Air quality, pollen, fires and weather data with street-level resolution

name: Luchtmeetnet
description: Air quality measurements and predictions for the Netherlands (RIVM)

name: World Bank Climate Data
description: Climate data and projections from the World Bank's Climate Knowledge Portal

name: Frost API (MET Norway)
description: Historical weather observation data from Norwegian weather stations

name: Ambee
description: Environmental data including pollen, air quality, soil, weather and fire data

name: WeatherUnlocked
description: Current weather and forecasts with free tier for developers, supports local weather

name: Finnish Meteorological Institute Open Data
description: Weather observations, forecasts and climate data from Finland's meteorological institute

name: KNMI Data Platform
description: Dutch weather data, climate observations and forecasts from the Royal Netherlands Meteorological Institute

description: French national weather service open data with forecasts and observations

description: Canadian weather data, forecasts and alerts from Environment and Climate Change Canada

name: Bureau of Meteorology (Australia)
description: Australian weather observations, forecasts and warnings from BOM

name: PM2.5 Open Data Portal
description: Open low-cost PM2.5 air quality sensor data from community-driven stations

name: UK Carbon Intensity
description: Carbon intensity of electricity generation for Great Britain by National Grid

name: Copernicus Atmosphere Monitoring (CAMS)
description: Global atmospheric composition including air quality forecasts and UV index

name: USGS Earthquake Hazards
description: Real-time earthquake data, seismic event notifications and hazard assessments

name: Open-Elevation
description: Free elevation data API providing altitude for any latitude/longitude coordinate

name: Weatherspark
description: Climate and average weather data visualizations for any location worldwide

name: OpenSnow
description: Snow forecast and snow report data for ski resorts and mountain locations

name: Agro Monitoring API
description: Agricultural weather data including soil temperature, moisture and satellite imagery

name: India Meteorological Department
description: Weather data and forecasts for India from the national weather service

name: Climate Data API (CCKP)

name: WeatherXM
description: Community-powered weather network with data from personal weather stations

name: Danish Meteorological Institute
description: Open weather and climate data from DMI including forecasts and observations in Denmark

name: Swiss Federal Office of Meteorology (MeteoSwiss)
description: Weather data and forecasts for Switzerland from the national weather service

name: Weather2020
description: Long-range weather forecasts up to a year ahead using proprietary algorithms

name: Climavision

name: EUMETSAT
